content: I'm planning a weekend of organizing my photos from the past month, including some amazing shots from a winter hike I went on December 20th with my new Sigma 24-70mm f/2.8 DG OS HSM Art lens. I just got my new Lowepro ProTactic 450 AW camera bag today, which is really helping me stay organized, so I'd like to upload them to my cloud storage. Can you walk me through the process of uploading files from my camera's memory card to the cloud?
